name: LowDoseICS_LABA_NonFormoterol
title: Low Dose ICS_LABA_Non Formoterol
purpose: (Clinical Focus: RxCUIs for ICS-long acting beta agonist inhalers except Formoterol),(Data Element Scope: DRUG_CLASS_MEMBERS: PHARMACOLOGIC:),(Inclusion Criteria: RxCUIs for inhalational agents that contain ICS and long-acting beta agonist (LABA)  in combination),(Exclusion Criteria: Non-inhalational agents and Formoterol)
